name: Nemesis Tamatou
description:
I Wanna Kill The BLB 2: Nemesis Tamatou is a Game I made for my Brother and for YOU! Escape the deadly Game Show known as Nemesis Tamatou! Buy Upgrades in the Shop from the lovely introverted and extroverted girl duo!

Meet new Friends along the way! Or kill them for cash! It is up to you. Just be a good person and get outta there! You can do it! I believe in you!
